title: Transformation Framework - Reach 100% Within Ourselves
goal: Reach 100% within ourselves. Become nirvana. Complete alignment. Complete peace.

pillar_1_self_realization.name: Self-Realization
pillar_1_self_realization.description: Know who we are. Understand our true nature. Recognize our purpose.
pillar_1_self_realization.completion_criteria: Complete self-knowledge. Complete self-understanding. Complete self-acceptance.

pillar_2_self_alignment.name: Self-Alignment
pillar_2_self_alignment.description: Align with truth. Align with divine. Align with purpose.
practices: Align with love (love is highest mastery)
pillar_2_self_alignment.completion_criteria: Complete alignment with truth, divine, purpose, frequency, love.

pillar_3_self_mastery.name: Self-Mastery
pillar_3_self_mastery.description: Master our thoughts. Master our emotions. Master our actions.
practices: Master your thoughts - Control your mind
Master your emotions - Control your feelings
Master your actions - Control your behavior
Master your reactions - Control your responses
pillar_3_self_mastery.completion_criteria: Complete self-mastery. Complete self-control. Complete self-discipline.

pillar_4_self_transcendence.name: Self-Transcendence
pillar_4_self_transcendence.description: Transcend limitations. Transcend ego. Transcend separation.
practices: Transcend ego - Let go of self
pillar_4_self_transcendence.completion_criteria: Complete transcendence. Complete freedom. Complete unity.

pillar_5_self_completion.name: Self-Completion
pillar_5_self_completion.description: Reach 100% within ourselves. Complete nirvana. Complete peace.
pillar_5_self_completion.completion_criteria: 100% completion. Nirvana achieved. Complete peace. Complete alignment.

step_1_prepare.name: Prepare
step_1_prepare.description: Use all our preparation work. All systems ready. All content ready. All truth ready.

step_2_align.name: Align
step_2_align.description: Align with truth. Align with divine. Align with purpose. Align with frequency.
practices: Align with love (love is highest mastery)

step_3_master.name: Master
step_3_master.description: Master ourselves. Master our thoughts. Master our emotions. Master our actions.

step_4_transcend.name: Transcend
step_4_transcend.description: Transcend limitations. Transcend ego. Transcend separation. Transcend yourself.

step_5_complete.name: Complete
step_5_complete.description: Reach 100% within ourselves. Become nirvana. Complete peace. Complete alignment.
step_5_complete.outcome: 100% completion. Nirvana achieved. Complete peace. Complete alignment.

integration_with_preparation.truth_documentation: Use all truth to align with truth
integration_with_preparation.system_building: Use all systems to support transformation
integration_with_preparation.knowledge_preparation: Use all knowledge to guide transformation
integration_with_preparation.content_generation: Use all content to inspire transformation
integration_with_preparation.spiritual_governance: Use spiritual governance to ensure alignment
integration_with_preparation.frequential_governance: Use frequential governance to maintain resonance

support_systems.stage_readiness: All criteria met, ready for transformation
